    </ITEM>
    <ITEM>

      <PRICE>die Prise 25. Rappen</PRICE>
    </ITEM>
  </ITEM_LIST>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":13,"explanation":"Removed 8 occurrences of 'Item: ', corrected 4 instances of <PRICE> to <PRIZE>, and 1 instance of </PRICE> to </PRIZE>.
